title: need help with pbe account cant create summoner name do not delete for reading
body: i cannot post on pbeboards because i am not level 1 summoner aka i cannot create post or anything it will not let me create my summoner i verified my email. Someone already read my last post and was deleted but again i cannot post on pbe boards.

replies.body: Hey, it may take a moment for your account to sync.  Try the [ syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)to give to move it along, otherwise you may need to wait a little bit to update on the boards.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qEpppgwm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-13T23:33:42.708+0000)
>
> Hey, it may take a moment for your account to sync.  Try the [ syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)to give to move it along, otherwise you may need to wait a little bit to update on the boards.

so i retry nothing happen pbe won't let me create summoner name i tried random names with numbers just not working at all :(

It sounds like this issue might be more specific to your PBE account if you're trying to create a summoner name, so you're aren't ready just yet to post on the boards.  If the name exceeds 16 letters or has inappropriate wording then you would run into trouble.  If you're still having an issue, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can see why there's a snag in the way.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qEpppgwm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-13T23:33:42.708+0000)
>
> Hey, it may take a moment for your account to sync.  Try the [ syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)to give to move it along, otherwise you may need to wait a little bit to update on the boards.

thank you for your response.
